title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Baker Mayfield's relationship with star wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. and what this tells us about his future as the face of the franchise. He provides an update on Aaron Rodgers being ruled out due to COVID protocols and if this will have an impact on his long term prospects of staying in Green Bay with the Packers. He talks to Greg Cosell from NFL Films about Tua Tagovailoa's limitations and former All Pro WR Torry Holt about the success of the Rams with new QB Matthew Stafford. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
